languages.text: "Это не доброта. Происходит что-то за гранью обычных козней культистов, каждый боец на счету".
"I'm not being friendly. What's happening is beyond normal cultist scheming. We can't afford to lose a single fighter."
languages.original_text: "Это не доброта. Происходит что-то за гранью обычных козней культистов, каждый боец на счету".

traits.locale_text: "I'm not being friendly. What's happening is beyond normal cultist scheming. We can't afford to lose a single fighter."
"I'm not being friendly. What's happening is beyond normal cultist scheming. We can't afford to lose a single fighter."
"I'm not being friendly. What's happening is beyond normal cultist scheming. We can't afford to lose a single fighter."
"I'm not being friendly. What's happening is beyond normal cultist scheming. We can't afford to lose a single fighter."
"I'm not being friendly. What's happening is beyond normal cultist scheming. We can't afford to lose a single fighter."
"I'm not being friendly. What's happening is beyond normal cultist scheming. We can't afford to lose a single fighter."

languages.text: "Ich bin nicht freundlich. Was hier vor sich geht, geht weit über die üblichen Intrigen der Kultisten hinaus. Wir können es uns nicht leisten, auch nur einen einzigen Kämpfer zu verlieren."
languages.original_text: "I'm not being friendly. What's happening is beyond normal cultist scheming. We can't afford to lose a single fighter."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin nicht freundlich. Was hier vor sich geht, geht weit über die üblichen Intrigen der Kultisten hinaus. Wir können es uns nicht leisten, auch nur einen einzigen Kämpfer zu verlieren."

languages.text: « Je ne me montre pas gentil. Ce qui se passe va bien au-delà des manigances habituelles des fanatiques. Nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre de perdre une seule combattante. »
languages.original_text: "I'm not being friendly. What's happening is beyond normal cultist scheming. We can't afford to lose a single fighter."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne me montre pas gentil. Ce qui se passe va bien au-delà des manigances habituelles des fanatiques. Nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre de perdre une seule combattante. »

languages.text: “我可不友善。只是因为现在发生的事情，已经超出了一般邪教阴谋的范畴，哪怕一位战士都不能失去。”
languages.original_text: "I'm not being friendly. What's happening is beyond normal cultist scheming. We can't afford to lose a single fighter."

traits.locale_text: “我可不友善。只是因为现在发生的事情，已经超出了一般邪教阴谋的范畴，哪怕一位战士都不能失去。”

languages.text: 「我は友好的なわけではありません。今起こっていることは普通の異端者のたくらみを超えています。一人も戦闘員を失う余裕などないのです」
languages.original_text: "I'm not being friendly. What's happening is beyond normal cultist scheming. We can't afford to lose a single fighter."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は友好的なわけではない。今起こっていることは普通の異端者のたくらみを超えている。一人も戦闘員を失う余裕なんかないんだ」

languages.text: «No estoy siendo amable. Lo que está ocurriendo va más allá de la maquinación cultista normal. No podemos permitirnos perder a nadie».
languages.original_text: "I'm not being friendly. What's happening is beyond normal cultist scheming. We can't afford to lose a single fighter."

traits.locale_text: «No estoy siendo amable. Lo que está ocurriendo va más allá de la maquinación cultista normal. No podemos permitirnos perder a nadie».

languages.text: "Dost canlısı olmakla alakası yok. Olan bitenler sıradan tarikat tertibini aşmış durumda. Tek bir savaşçıyı dahi kaybetme lüksümüz yok."
languages.original_text: "I'm not being friendly. What's happening is beyond normal cultist scheming. We can't afford to lose a single fighter."

traits.locale_text: "Samimi davranmıyorum. Vaziyet artık sıradan tarikatçı işi boyutunu aşmış durumda. Bir tek savaşçıyı dahi kaybetme lüksümüz yok."
